alert.note: Alert for Izard (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 07 at 11:57PM CST until February 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Much of northern, western, and central Arkansas. * WHEN...Through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rain and thunderstorms are expected to develop and move across the watch area. Two to four inches of rain with localized amounts up to 5 inches is expected, which could lead to flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
